channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ShopLentor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ShopLentor

item.title: CVE-2023-0232|2023-02-21T08:51:02.165Z -- unknown -- shoplentor
item.description: The ShopLentor WordPress plugin before 2.5.4 unserializes user input from cookies in order to track viewed products and user data, which could lead to PHP Object Injection.

item.title: CVE-2023-0231|2023-02-21T08:50:38.876Z -- unknown -- shoplentor
item.description: The ShopLentor WordPress plugin before 2.5.4 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
